name: Brian Ahern
title: Senior Associate
credentials: J.D., Fordham University School of Law, 2009
Licensed in Pennsylvania and New York
bio: Brian Ahern is a skilled litigator who represents insurance companies, businesses, and individuals in a wide range of civil litigation matters. As a Senior Associate at Swartz Campbell, Brian has extensive experience defending clients in personal injury claims, professional liability suits, and commercial disputes. His practice focuses on insurance defense work, where he provides cost-effective and strategic representation to insurers and their insureds. Brian has successfully tried numerous cases to verdict and has a strong track record of achieving favorable settlements for his clients. He is experienced in all phases of litigation, from initial case evaluation through trial and appeal. Brian's analytical approach and thorough case preparation have earned him recognition among insurance industry professionals and fellow attorneys. He regularly handles complex multi-party litigation and has particular expertise in construction defect claims, premises liability, and product liability cases.
